Title: Estate Sale
Writer: Teresa Pavlinek, Eugene Levy (created by), Dan Levy (created by), Chris Pozzebon (executive story editor), Stephanie Kaliner (story), Matt Kippen (story), David West Read (story), Amanda Walsh (story)

Plot: Johnny and Moira go to a local estate sale auction, where they wonder what ever happened to their old possessions. Jocelyn spots what looks like a new mattress at the sale and wants to buy ...
